reviews.review_msg: Dr. Davis seems very engaged in her lectures and is very caring of her students. She answers questions asked during class and tries her best to explain it to the rest of the class. The reading in this course is a bit heavy but not impossible.
Although he has interesting things to say and the readings were fun. He is not clear on assignments and wants to see his own opinion repeated in the stidents works.

Here's the thing. I found this course easy. Others? Not so much. I don't blame them. It's difficult to soak in knowledge when the lecturer's voice sounds like the lullaby I'll play to my future child to put him/her to sleep. As if that wasn't enough, the man paces around like a pendulum in a further attempt to hypnotize students into hibernation.

Unclear grading scheme. He doesn't try to help students succeed. Things learned in this class are completely useless. It's a 100 level english course yet we're learning about genre analysis and scientific writing. Course material was difficult to understand. Lectures are boring enough to put an insomniac to sleep.
I like him, but I hate his lecture

The most boring lecture I have ever attended in all of university. Peter's voice put me to sleep every class. The papers have no structure and grading is never clear. I did not learn anything about english nor did I improve my writing skills. 114 is about analyzing scientific writing- not what the description says on canvas. DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS
